title: President Opens Mahinda Rajapaksa Vocational Training Centre in Palestine
content: President Mahinda Rajapaksa, on Monday (Jan. 06) opened the Mahinda Rajapaksa Vocational Training Centre in Betunia, Palestine. President and First Lady Shiranthi Wickremasinghe Rajapaksa, who were accompanied by Palestinian Foreign Affairs Minister Mr. Riyad Al-Maliki were received by the Mayor of Betunia His Worship Ribhi W. Dola and the Governor of Ramallah Dr. Laila Ghammam….
